application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Submission of a basement excavation and construction management plan in pursuant to condition 7 of planning permission ref:  202604FUL dated 14/01/2022 for 'Excavation to form basement level with light wells and sunken courtyard to provide single self-contained flat (for a total of three); associated amenity, cycle storage, and waste storage spaces; internal alterations to layout of ground floor flat; alterations to ground floor side (west) elevation involving removal of window opening and installation of glazed doors, to rear (south) elevations involving replacing door opening with window, and removal of window opening; and raising height of parapet wall to ground floor rear extension'
